title: Episode 779 - Special Guest Neil deGrasse Tyson
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by Neil Degrasse Tyson to discuss his new book ‘Cosmic Queries’ and the massive questions about the universe it asks — plus Neil explains why he DOES NOT think we live in a simulation, shares his thoughts the mu...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by Neil Degrasse Tyson to discuss his new book ‘Cosmic Queries’ and the massive questions about the universe it asks — plus Neil explains why he DOES NOT think we live in a simulation, shares his thoughts the multiverse, and explains what it will take to get humans on Mars.
